objects.name: Test Creature
objects.description: Gives 1 Cold to Right Neighbour

objects.name: Test Building
objects.description: Produces Food. Gains Work from slots 1&5

objects.name: Test Event
objects.description: Places 1 Hot on every Creature

objects.name: Test Eclipse
objects.description: Init: attr Eclipse =1;

objects.name: Test Token
objects.description: Blah Blah Blah

objects.name: Token - Food
objects.description: Clears the Oldest Token on the Creature

objects.name: Token - Shield
objects.description: Protects the Creature from gaining the next Token once

objects.name: Event Harsh Winds+
objects.description: All creatures without Neighbours get 1 Cold

objects.name: Creature Earth elemental
objects.description: Treats any Gifted token as Food; Produces +1 Work if 2 slots are filled

objects.name: Event Cold Snap
objects.description: Target: bottom line;  If the line has Free Slots, each Creature gets 1 Cold

objects.name: Creature Dragonling+
objects.description: Gives 1 Hot to both Neighbours

objects.name: Event Heat Wave+
objects.description: Gives 1 Hot to each Creature with Neighbours

objects.name: Event Spoil & Rot
objects.description: Destroys 1 Token in the Storage for each Hot token on Creatures

objects.name: Event Purple Comet+
objects.description: All Leftmost Creatures get 2 Chaos

objects.name: Event Shared Suffering
objects.description: All Creatures Steal 1 last Token from their right Neighbour; If there’s nothing to steal - they gain 1 Chaos

objects.name: Event Extra Rations
objects.description: Gives 1 Order to each Rightmost creature; Produces 1 Food for each Death

objects.name: Event Diligence
objects.description: Gives 1 Order to each Non-Working creature (NOT in Production slots)

objects.name: Event Weight of Responsibility
objects.description: Gives 1 Stress to each Working creature (in Production slots)

objects.name: Event Spreading Fear+
objects.description: Each Creature gives its Neighbours 1 Stress

objects.name: Event Feast in the time of Plague
objects.description: Target: Central Row;  Gives 1 Joy to each Creature in Innermost slots

objects.name: Event Fruits of Laziness
objects.description: Clears Work from all Buildings equal to the number of Joy tokens on Creatures

objects.name: Event Ritual Sacrifice
objects.description: Target: Top Row;  Kills the Rightmost Creature;  Clears all Tokens from all other Creatures on the Row

objects.name: Event Frenzied Hustle
objects.description: Each Leftmost Creature uses its Ability 3 times; Each Death Produces 1 Shield

objects.name: Spontaneous Mutation
objects.description: Each Creature gets a random Token

objects.name: Creature Sand lizard+
objects.description: Produces 1 Work for each Hot token

objects.name: Creature Yeti
objects.description: Treats Cold as Shields; Produces 1 Work for each Shield

objects.name: Creature Imp Overseer+
objects.description: Gives 1 Stress to Neighbour to the Right; Produces 1 work for each Stress on that Neighbour

objects.name: Creature Grim Reaper
objects.description: Gives 2 Stress to Neighbour on the Left; Produces 4 Work for each Death on its Line

objects.name: Creature Friendly Neigbour+
objects.description: Gives 1 Joy to the Left Neighbour; Gives 1 Stress to the Right Neighbour

objects.name: Creature Chilled Gillman+
objects.description: Gives 1 Joy to the Right Neighbour

objects.name: Creature Cursed Frog+
objects.description: Transforms into a random Creature (from MD) if both Neighbours have a Joy token

objects.name: Creature Killjoy Cultist+
objects.description: Clears all Joy from its Line, produces 1 Work for each cleared Joy

objects.name: Creature Kobold Prospector+
objects.description: Gives 1 Work for each 2 free Slots on its Line

objects.name: Creature Horned Demon+
objects.description: Gives 1 Hot to every other Creature on its Line; Produces 1 Work for each Hot on its Line

objects.name: Creature Corrupted Soldier+
objects.description: +1 Work with at least 1 Neighbour; +1 Chaos without any Neighbours

objects.name: Creature Toucan Taskmaster+
objects.description: Gives 1 Order to the Left Neighbour, makes it produce +1 Work

objects.name: Building Watchtower
objects.description: Produces Shields.  +1 work for every Creature in Innermost slots (2,3,4)

objects.name: Building Barracks
objects.description: Produces Shields.  +1 work for every Creature in Innermost slots (2,3,4)

objects.name: Building Gold mine
objects.description: Produces Gold.  +1 work for every Creature in Outermost slots (1,5)

objects.name: Building Kobold tunnel
objects.description: Produces Gold. +1 work for every Creature w/o neighbours

objects.name: Building Decrepit Mill
objects.description: Produces Food. +1 work for every Creature in Outermost slots (1,5)

objects.name: Building Baker’s House
objects.description: Produces Food.  +1 work for every Creature with 2 neighbours

objects.name: Eclipse Star Strike
objects.description: Init: attr Eclipse =1;

objects.name: Test Hot Creature
objects.description: Gives 1 Hot to right neighbor

objects.name: Test Cold Creature
objects.description: Gives 1 Cold to right neighbor

objects.name: Test Hot Event
objects.description: Adds 1 Hot to all creatures in top row

objects.name: Token - Gold
objects.description: Makes a Creature immediately use its Ability

objects.name: Creature Frost spider+
objects.description: Gives 1 Cold to 2 Creatures to the Left

objects.name: Test CreateEntity
objects.description: Does AMAZING THINGS

objects.name: Place
objects.admin_descr: Int. Value = Place Id, i.e. in what Deck or Place on the Board this Card currently lies

objects.name: Number
objects.admin_descr: Int. Value = number displayed on a Widget (picture+icon). Eligible only for [Widget] Card Types.

objects.name: Show Duration
objects.admin_descr: Int. If attr >0, enables the Timer widget on the Card (timer number = attr value)

objects.name: Token Slots
objects.admin_descr: Int. The number of Token Slots on the Card

objects.name: Type
objects.admin_descr: enum. 1 = Creature, 2 = Token, 3 = Event, 4 = Building, 5 = Eclipse

objects.name: Creature Number
objects.admin_descr: Int. Creature's slot number. Useful for stuff like 'affects all Creatures in slots 2 & 4"

objects.name: Token Count
objects.admin_descr: Int. Displays the current number of Tokens on the Card

objects.name: Token Type
objects.admin_descr: Int. Used to address tokens of specific Type (i.e. Hot)

objects.name: Token Origin
objects.admin_descr: Int. Place Id where the token originated (for animation)

objects.name: ~001: Move N Cards by Cond X to place Y & DO
~003: Create a Token [TplId] on a Creature in Place [X]
~004: Move N Cards of tplId Y from MD to Place X
~006: Create a Token of Type [Y] in Place [X] with Amount [Z]
Apply to Creatures in Row with Cond
Discard type of card/tokens in Row
Create N Work to Building in current Row
Number of Tokens in Place X
Number of Creatures in Place X
Number of Tokens [Token type] in Place X
~010:Number of THINGS with Cond Y in Place X
Get Card's Row by Current Place
